    • Constructor Detail

      • PositionFilterOption

        public PositionFilterOption(Filter filter,
                            int filterMode,
                            VaultEntryType type)
        Searches the given dataset for one specific position.
        Parameters:
        filter - The FilterResult of this Filter will be used as working data for the position search. Use a NoneFilter if you don't want to run an extra Filter.

        filterMode - Configures the position search:

        FIRST: The first entry of the input data
        LAST: The last entry
        MIDDLE: The entry with the middle index
        DATE_MIDDLE: The entry with the timestamp located in the middle between the first and the last entry
        WEIGHTED_MIDDLE: The entry with the timestamp located nearest to the calculated weighted middle of a given type.

        type - VaultEntryType only relevant for WEIGHTED_MIDDLE, ignored otherwise

      • PositionFilterOption

        public PositionFilterOption(Filter filter,
                            int filterMode)
        Searches the given dataset for one specific position.
        Parameters:
        filter - The FilterResult of this Filter will be used as working data for the position search. Use a NoneFilter if you don't want to run an extra Filter.

        filterMode - Configures the position search:

        FIRST: The first entry of the input data
        LAST: The last entry
        MIDDLE: The entry with the middle index
        DATE_MIDDLE: The entry with the timestamp located in the middle between the first and the last entry

      • PositionFilterOption

        public PositionFilterOption(Filter filter,
                            VaultEntryType type)
        Searches the given dataset for the weighted middle.
        Parameters:
        filter - The FilterResult of this Filter will be used as working data for the position search
        type - type for the weighted middle calculation
